channel.title: How do you make a downloadable client?
channel.description: I was wondering how do you make a downloadable client?

item.title: How do you make a downloadable client?
item.dc:creator: @Rngu4fun Rngu4fun
item.description:
@Rngu4fun wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:2, topic:345099”]Like you give the person a link to a file sharing site, and they download it?

Put the client into a RAR file, upload to -
Megaupload.com

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.


Uppit.com

Or any other you can think of. When it’s done uploading, it gives you a link and you give that to people…

I’m still not sure that’s what you meant?[/quote]

No i thinks he means like how do u make a client,and then make it downloadable

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a downloadable client?

item.title: How do you make a downloadable client?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Like you give the person a link to a file sharing site, and they download it?

Put the client into a RAR file, upload to -
Megaupload.com
or

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.


or
Uppit.com

Or any other you can think of. When it’s done uploading, it gives you a link and you give that to people…

I’m still not sure that’s what you meant?
